background: 韩菱纱 is a character in 《仙剑奇侠传四》 by 上海软星, born into the 韩氏 family, a lineage of tomb raiders.
Orphaned at a young age, she roams the江湖 alone, making a living through tomb raiding, with a tough and independent spirit.
After meeting 云天河 and 柳梦璃, she joins them on a quest for immortality, seeking answers to longevity, only to discover she bears a blood sacrifice curse that shortens her life.
During the journey, she falls in love with 云天河, but parts with him forever at 青鸾峰, leaving behind endless regrets.

skill1.name: 双燕回旋
skill1.description: Wields dual short swords in a rapid spinning attack, swift as a swallow, ideal for close combat against multiple foes.

skill2.name: 飞镖暗袭
skill2.description: Throws darts to ambush enemies, precise and lethal, excels at ranged suppression.

treasure/special_ability.name: 血祭之力
treasure/special_ability.range: Close range (covers a few meters around)
treasure/special_ability.description: Activates the curse within her bloodline, temporarily boosting attack power at the cost of her own life force, a tragic symbol of the 韩氏 legacy.
